alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 25 at 3:07AM PDT until October 26 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Willapa Hills, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and South Washington Cascade Foothills. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 9 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to become even colder Thursday night through the weekend.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Cascade Foothills; Willapa Hills
